mapper.select: select * from t_main_issue_kh where id =#{id}
mapper.insert:
select IFNULL(max(id)+1,1) AS id from t_main_issue_kh
insert into t_main_issue_kh( id,qhzd_id,qhzd_name,zxcl,ajbz,ascl,kscl,wzxgfx,ffts,dbwz,gzxt,sljb,xcjz,xcbd,jdjc,khyf,khsj,bm_type ) values( #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qhzdId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qhzdName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zxcl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ajbz, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ascl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kscl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wzxgfx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ffts, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbwz, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gzxt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sljb, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcjz, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcbd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jdjc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{khyf, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{khsj, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update t_main_issue_kh
qhzd_id=#{qhzdId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qhzd_name=#{qhzdName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zxcl=#{zxcl, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ajbz=#{ajbz, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ascl=#{ascl, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
kscl=#{kscl, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wzxgfx=#{wzxgfx, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ffts=#{ffts, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dbwz=#{dbwz, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gzxt=#{gzxt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sljb=#{sljb, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xcjz=#{xcjz, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xcbd=#{xcbd, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jdjc=#{jdjc, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
khyf=#{khyf, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
khsj=#{khsj, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bm_type=#{bmType, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id}

update t_main_issue_kh
qhzd_id=#{qhzdId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qhzd_name=#{qhzdName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zxcl=#{zxcl, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ajbz=#{ajbz, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ascl=#{ascl, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
kscl=#{kscl, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wzxgfx=#{wzxgfx, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ffts=#{ffts, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dbwz=#{dbwz, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gzxt=#{gzxt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sljb=#{sljb, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xcjz=#{xcjz, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xcbd=#{xcbd, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jdjc=#{jdjc, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
khyf=#{khyf, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
khsj=#{khsj, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bm_type=#{bmType, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from (select * from act_id_group where pid_ is null and type_=#{bmType})g left join ( select t.qhzd_id,t.qhzd_name,FORMAT(avg(t.zxcl),2)as zxcl,FORMAT(avg(t.ajbz),2) as ajbz, FORMAT(avg(t.ascl),2) as ascl,FORMAT(avg(t.kscl),2) as kscl,FORMAT(avg(t.wzxgfx),2)as wzxgfx,FORMAT(avg(t.ffts),2)as ffts, FORMAT(avg(t.dbwz),2)as dbwz,FORMAT(avg(t.gzxt),2)as gzxt,FORMAT(avg(t.sljb),2) as sljb,FORMAT(avg(t.xcjz),2) as xcjz,FORMAT(avg(t.xcbd),2)as xcbd,FORMAT(avg(t.jdjc),2) as jdjc from t_main_issue_kh t
and t.bm_type = #{bmType}
and t.khyf like '${khyf}%'
GROUP BY t.qhzd_id )t1 on g.ID_=t1.qhzd_id

select t1.qhdm,t1.qhmc, t1.zi_xing_counts, t2.li_an_counts, IFNULL(t1.zi_xing_counts/(t1.zi_xing_counts+t2.li_an_counts),0)*150 as score FROM ( SELECT a.qhdm, a.qhmc AS qhmc, IFNULL(b.counts,0) as zi_xing_counts FROM ( SELECT LEFT (qhdm, 9) AS qhdm, qhmc FROM t_sys_qhzd WHERE qhjb = 2 ) a LEFT JOIN ( select t3.counts, left(t4.org_no_,9) qhdm from ( select count(add_userid) as counts ,add_userid from (select process_id , add_userid from t_main_issue where status = '16') t1, (select proc_inst_id_ from act_hi_taskinst where name_ in ('自处置','线下督查','街道处理') and date_format(start_time_,'%Y-%m')=date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 0 MONTH),'%Y-%m') GROUP BY proc_inst_id_) t2 where t1.process_id = t2.proc_inst_id_ )t3 left join act_id_user t4 on t3.add_userid = t4.id_ GROUP BY qhdm ) b ON a.qhdm = b.qhdm GROUP BY a.qhdm ) t1 join ( SELECT a.qhdm, a.qhmc AS qhmc, IFNULL(b.counts,0) as li_an_counts FROM ( SELECT LEFT (qhdm, 9) AS qhdm, qhmc FROM t_sys_qhzd WHERE qhjb = 2 ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t3.counts,left(t4.org_no_,9) as qhdm from (select count(1) as counts ,add_userid,issue_type from (select process_id, add_userid, issue_type from t_main_issue) t1, (select proc_inst_id_ from act_hi_taskinst where name_ = '主管部门处理' and date_format(start_time_,'%Y-%m')=date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 0 MONTH),'%Y-%m') GROUP BY proc_inst_id_) t2 where t1.process_id = t2.proc_inst_id_ ) t3 left join act_id_user t4 on t3.add_userid = t4.id_ GROUP BY qhdm ) b ON a.qhdm = b.qhdm GROUP BY a.qhdm ) t2 on t1.qhdm = t2.qhdm order by t1.qhdm

select t1.qhdm, t1.qhmc, t1.counts, t2.last_year_avg_counts, IFNULL(t1.counts/t2.last_year_avg_counts,1)*150 as score FROM ( SELECT a.qhdm, a.qhmc AS qhmc, IFNULL(b.counts,0) as counts FROM ( SELECT LEFT (qhdm, 9) AS qhdm, qhmc FROM t_sys_qhzd WHERE qhjb = 2 ) a LEFT JOIN ( select count(1) AS counts ,LEFT(issue_number, 9) AS qhdm from t_main_issue where date_format(add_time,'%Y-%m')=date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m') GROUP BY qhdm )b ON a.qhdm = b.qhdm GROUP BY a.qhdm ) t1 JOIN ( SELECT a.qhmc AS qhmc, a.qhdm, IFNULL(b.counts,0) as last_year_avg_counts FROM ( SELECT LEFT (qhdm, 9) AS qhdm, qhmc FROM t_sys_qhzd WHERE qhjb = 2 ) a LEFT JOIN ( select IFNULL(count(1),0)/5 counts, LEFT(issue_number, 9) AS qhdm from t_main_issue where date_format(add_time,'%Y%m') >= concat(date_format(now(),'%Y')-1,'01') and date_format(add_time,'%Y%m') <= concat(date_format(now(),'%Y')-1,'05') GROUP BY qhdm )b ON a.qhdm = b.qhdm GROUP BY a.qhdm ) t2 on t1.qhdm = t2.qhdm order by t1.qhdm

select t1.qhdm, t1.qhmc, t1.overtime_counts,t2.counts,IFNULL((1-t1.overtime_counts/t2.counts)*150,0) as score FROM ( SELECT a.qhdm, a.qhmc AS qhmc, IFNULL(b.counts,0) as overtime_counts FROM ( SELECT LEFT (qhdm, 9) AS qhdm, qhmc FROM t_sys_qhzd WHERE qhjb = 2 ) a LEFT JOIN ( select count(id) as counts,left(issue_number, 9) as qhdm from t_main_issue where status = '16' and TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,add_time,end_time) > 2*24*60*60 AND add_time IS NOT NULL AND end_time IS NOT NULL and date_format(end_time,'%Y-%m')=date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m') group by qhdm )b ON a.qhdm = b.qhdm GROUP BY a.qhdm ) t1 JOIN ( SELECT a.qhdm, a.qhmc AS qhmc, IFNULL(b.counts,0) as counts FROM ( SELECT LEFT (qhdm, 9) AS qhdm, qhmc FROM t_sys_qhzd WHERE qhjb = 2 ) a LEFT JOIN ( select count(id) as counts,left(issue_number, 9) as qhdm from t_main_issue where status = '16' AND add_time IS NOT NULL AND end_time IS NOT NULL and date_format(end_time,'%Y-%m')=date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m') group by qhdm )b ON a.qhdm = b.qhdm GROUP BY a.qhdm ) t2 on t1.qhdm = t2.qhdm order by t1.qhdm

SELECT a.qhdm, a.qhmc AS qhmc, IFNULL(b.score,0) as score FROM ( SELECT LEFT (qhdm, 9) AS qhdm, qhmc FROM t_sys_qhzd WHERE qhjb = 2 ) a LEFT JOIN ( select AVG((1-CONVERT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,add_time,end_time),SIGNED)/(CONVERT(time_limit,SIGNED)*24*60*60))*150) as score ,left(issue_number, 9) qhdm from t_main_issue where end_time IS NOT NULL and time_limit is not null and time_limit!='' and add_time is not null and date_format(end_time,'%Y-%m')=date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m') group by qhdm )b ON a.qhdm = b.qhdm GROUP BY a.qhdm order by a.qhdm

select h.id,h.qhzd_id,h.qhzd_name,t6.score from(select * from t_main_issue_kh where bm_type='2' and khyf=#{khyf}) h LEFT JOIN (select t3.id_,t3.name_,FORMAT(IFNULL(t3.c1/(t3.c2),0)*150,2) as score,t3.khyf from ( select t1.id_,t1.name_,t1.c1,t2.c2,t2.khyf from ( SELECT * FROM (SELECT pid_,id_,NAME_,TYPE_ FROM act_id_group WHERE TYPE_ ='2' AND PID_ IS NULL ORDER BY TYPE_) b left JOIN ( select t1.issue_exec_street,IFNULL(COUNT(t1.issue_exec_street),0) c1,t1.khyf from (select * from (select *,DATE_FORMAT(add_time,'%Y-%m')as khyf from t_main_issue where add_time like '%${khyf}%' )t INNER JOIN act_id_membership a ON t.add_userid = a.USER_ID_ and t.`status`='16' and t.zxcz_type='1' )t1 group by t1.issue_exec_street ) c ON c.issue_exec_street=b.ID_)t1 left join( SELECT * FROM (SELECT pid_,id_,NAME_,TYPE_ FROM act_id_group WHERE TYPE_ ='2' AND PID_ IS NULL ORDER BY TYPE_) b left JOIN ( select t1.issue_exec_street,IFNULL(COUNT(t1.issue_exec_street),0) c2,t1.khyf from (select * from (select *,DATE_FORMAT(add_time,'%Y-%m')as khyf from t_main_issue where add_time like '%${khyf}%' )t INNER JOIN act_id_membership a ON t.add_userid = a.USER_ID_ and t.`status`='16' and t.zxcz_type in('1','2'))t1 group by t1.issue_exec_street ) c ON c.issue_exec_street=b.ID_)t2 on t1.id_=t2.id_)t3)t6 on h.qhzd_id=t6.id_

select h.id,h.qhzd_id,h.qhzd_name,t6.score from(select * from t_main_issue_kh where bm_type='2' and khyf=#{khyf} ) h LEFT JOIN ( select t1.id_,t1.name_,FORMAT(IFNULL(if(t1.c1/(t2.c2)>0,t1.c1/(t2.c2),0),0)*150,2) as score,t1.khyf from (select d.id_,d.name_,d.c1,d.khyf from ( SELECT * FROM (select * FROM act_id_group WHERE TYPE_ ='2' AND PID_ IS NULL ORDER BY TYPE_) b left JOIN (select t2.issue_exec,count(t2.issue_exec)as c1,t.khyf from (select *,DATE_FORMAT(add_time,'%Y-%m')as khyf from t_main_issue) t INNER JOIN act_id_membership a ON t.add_userid = a.USER_ID_ and t.`status`='16' and t.time_limit-t.actual_time>0 and khyf= #{khyf} inner join t_issue_lbbm t2 on t.issue_number=t2.issue_number group BY issue_exec) c ON c.issue_exec=b.ID_) d)t1, (select d.id_,d.name_,d.c2,d.khyf from (SELECT * FROM (select * FROM act_id_group WHERE TYPE_ ='2' AND PID_ IS NULL ORDER BY TYPE_) b left JOIN (select t2.issue_exec,count(t2.issue_exec)as c2,t.khyf from (select *,DATE_FORMAT(add_time,'%Y-%m')as khyf from t_main_issue) t INNER JOIN act_id_membership a ON t.add_userid = a.USER_ID_ and t.`status`='16' and khyf=#{khyf} inner join t_issue_lbbm t2 on t.issue_number=t2.issue_number group BY issue_exec ) c ON c.issue_exec=b.ID_ ) d)t2 where t1.id_=t2.id_)t6 on h.qhzd_id=t6.id_

select h.id,h.qhzd_id,h.qhzd_name,t6.score from(select * from t_main_issue_kh where bm_type='5' and khyf=#{khyf}) h LEFT JOIN ( select t1.id_,t1.name_,FORMAT(IFNULL(if(t1.c1/(t2.c2)>0,t1.c1/(t2.c2),0),0)*150,2) as score,t1.khyf from (select d.id_,d.name_,d.c1,d.khyf from ( SELECT * FROM (select * FROM act_id_group WHERE TYPE_ ='5' AND PID_ IS NULL ORDER BY TYPE_) b left JOIN (select t.issue_exec_street,count(t.issue_exec_street)as c1,t.khyf from (select *,DATE_FORMAT(add_time,'%Y-%m')as khyf from t_main_issue) t INNER JOIN act_id_membership a ON t.add_userid = a.USER_ID_ and t.`status`='16' and t.time_limit-t.actual_time>0 and khyf= #{khyf} group BY issue_exec_street) c ON c.issue_exec_street=b.ID_) d)t1,
(select d.id_,d.name_,d.c2,d.khyf from ( SELECT * FROM (select * FROM act_id_group WHERE TYPE_ ='5' AND PID_ IS NULL ORDER BY TYPE_) b left JOIN (select t.issue_exec_street,count(t.issue_exec_street)as c2,t.khyf from (select *,DATE_FORMAT(add_time,'%Y-%m')as khyf from t_main_issue) t INNER JOIN act_id_membership a ON t.add_userid = a.USER_ID_ and t.`status`='16' and khyf=#{khyf} group BY issue_exec_street) c ON c.issue_exec_street=b.ID_) d)t2 where t1.id_=t2.id_)t6 on h.qhzd_id=t6.id_

select h.id,h.qhzd_id,h.qhzd_name,t6.score from(select * from t_main_issue_kh where bm_type='2' and khyf=#{khyf}) h LEFT JOIN ( select t1.id_,t1.NAME_,FORMAT(IFNULL(t2.score,0),2)score from (SELECT id_,NAME_,TYPE_ FROM act_id_group WHERE TYPE_ ='2' AND PID_ IS NULL ORDER BY TYPE_)t1 LEFT JOIN(select l.issue_exec , avg(IFNULL(if(1 - t.actual_time /t.time_limit>0,1 - t.actual_time /t.time_limit,0),0) * 150) AS score from (select * from t_main_issue where add_time like '%${khyf}%' ) t LEFT JOIN t_issue_lbbm l on t.issue_number=l.issue_number and t.time_limit is not null GROUP BY l.issue_exec )t2 on t1.id_=t2.issue_exec) t6 on h.qhzd_id=t6.id_

select h.id,h.qhzd_id,h.qhzd_name,t6.score from(select * from t_main_issue_kh where bm_type='5' and khyf=#{khyf}) h LEFT JOIN ( select t1.id_,t1.NAME_,FORMAT(IFNULL(t2.score,0),2)score from (SELECT id_,NAME_,TYPE_ FROM act_id_group WHERE TYPE_ ='5' AND PID_ IS NULL ORDER BY TYPE_)t1 LEFT JOIN(select l.issue_exec , avg(IFNULL(if(1 - t.actual_time /t.time_limit>0,1 - t.actual_time /t.time_limit,0),0) * 150) AS score from (select * from t_main_issue where add_time like '%${khyf}%') t LEFT JOIN t_issue_lbbm l on t.issue_number=l.issue_number and t.time_limit is not null GROUP BY l.issue_exec )t2 on t1.id_=t2.issue_exec ) t6 on h.qhzd_id=t6.id_

select h.id,h.qhzd_id,h.qhzd_name,t6.score from(select * from t_main_issue_kh where bm_type='2' and khyf=#{khyf}) h LEFT JOIN ( SELECT g.id_,g.name_,FORMAT(IFNULL(a.c,0),2)as score,a.source_id,a.source_name FROM (SELECT id_,NAME_,TYPE_ FROM act_id_group WHERE TYPE_ ='2' AND PID_ IS NULL ORDER BY TYPE_) g left join(SELECT d.qhzd_id,d.qhzd_name,IFNULL(sum(d.score),0)c,d.source_id,d.source_name FROM (select * from `t_issue_dcdb_kh` where khyf like '2018-04%') d group by d.qhzd_id,d.source_id)a on g.id_=a.qhzd_id ORDER BY g.TYPE_) t6 on h.qhzd_id=t6.id_

select h.id,h.qhzd_id,h.qhzd_name,t6.score from (select * from t_main_issue_kh where bm_type='5' and khyf=#{khyf}) h LEFT JOIN ( SELECT g.id_,g.name_,FORMAT(IFNULL(a.c,0),2)as score,a.source_id,a.source_name FROM (SELECT id_,NAME_,TYPE_ FROM act_id_group WHERE TYPE_ ='5' AND PID_ IS NULL ORDER BY TYPE_) g left join(SELECT d.qhzd_id,d.qhzd_name,IFNULL(sum(d.score),0)c,d.source_id,d.source_name FROM (select * from `t_issue_dcdb_kh` where khyf like '%${khyf}%') d group by d.qhzd_id,d.source_id)a on g.id_=a.qhzd_id ORDER BY g.TYPE_) t6 on h.qhzd_id=t6.id_

select h.id,h.qhzd_id,h.qhzd_name,IFNULL(t6.score,0)score from (select * from t_main_issue_kh where bm_type='2' and khyf=#{khyf}) h LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t5.id_, t5.name_,FORMAT(IFNULL(t5.c1/(t5.c2),0)*150,2) as score FROM( select t3.id_,t3.name_,t3.c1,t4.c2,t3.add_time from (SELECT b.id_,b.name_,IFNULL(c.issueNum2,0) as c1,c.add_time FROM (SELECT pid_,id_,NAME_,TYPE_ FROM act_id_group WHERE TYPE_ ='2' AND PID_ IS NULL ORDER BY TYPE_) b left JOIN ( select t1.issue_exec_street,COUNT(t1.issue_exec_street)issueNum2,t1.add_time from(SELECT t.* from (select a.main_issue_id as main_issue_id,count(a.main_issue_id) as count from t_attachment a where a.type=1 or a.type=5 GROUP BY a.main_issue_id HAVING count>=2 ORDER BY a.main_issue_id) as b LEFT JOIN t_main_issue t on b.main_issue_id=t.id and t.add_time like '%${khyf}%')t1 group by t1.issue_exec_street ) c ON c.issue_exec_street=b.ID_)t3 left join ( SELECT * FROM (SELECT pid_,id_,NAME_,TYPE_ FROM act_id_group WHERE TYPE_ ='2' AND PID_ IS NULL ORDER BY TYPE_) b left JOIN ( select t1.issue_exec_street,IFNULL(COUNT(t1.issue_exec_street),0) c2,t1.add_time from(select * from t_main_issue t INNER JOIN act_id_membership a ON t.add_userid = a.USER_ID_ and t.`status`='16' and t.zxcz_type='1' )t1 where t1.add_time like '%${khyf}%' group by t1.issue_exec_street ) c ON c.issue_exec_street=b.ID_ )t4 on t3.id_=t4.id_)t5)t6 on h.qhzd_id=t6.id_

select h.id,h.qhzd_id,h.qhzd_name,IFNULL(t6.score,0)score from (select * from t_main_issue_kh where bm_type='2' and khyf=#{khyf}) h LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t5.id_, t5.name_,FORMAT(IFNULL(t5.c1/(t5.c2),0)*150,2) as score FROM( select t3.id_,t3.name_,t3.c1,t4.c2,t3.add_time from (SELECT b.id_,b.name_,IFNULL(c.issueNum2,0) as c1,c.add_time FROM (SELECT pid_,id_,NAME_,TYPE_ FROM act_id_group WHERE TYPE_ ='5' AND PID_ IS NULL ORDER BY TYPE_) b left JOIN ( select t1.issue_exec_street,COUNT(t1.issue_exec_street)issueNum2,t1.add_time from(SELECT t.* from (select a.main_issue_id as main_issue_id,count(a.main_issue_id) as count from t_attachment a where a.type=1 or a.type=5 GROUP BY a.main_issue_id HAVING count>=2 ORDER BY a.main_issue_id) as b LEFT JOIN t_main_issue t on b.main_issue_id=t.id and t.add_time like '%${khyf}%')t1 group by t1.issue_exec_street ) c ON c.issue_exec_street=b.ID_)t3 left join ( SELECT * FROM (SELECT pid_,id_,NAME_,TYPE_ FROM act_id_group WHERE TYPE_ ='5' AND PID_ IS NULL ORDER BY TYPE_) b left JOIN ( select t1.issue_exec_street,IFNULL(COUNT(t1.issue_exec_street),0) c2,t1.add_time from(select * from t_main_issue t INNER JOIN act_id_membership a ON t.add_userid = a.USER_ID_ and t.`status`='16' and t.zxcz_type='1' )t1 where t1.add_time like '%${khyf}%' group by t1.issue_exec_street ) c ON c.issue_exec_street=b.ID_ )t4 on t3.id_=t4.id_)t5)t6 on h.qhzd_id=t6.id_

select h.id,h.qhzd_id,h.qhzd_name,t6.score from(select * from t_main_issue_kh where bm_type='2' and khyf=#{khyf}) h LEFT JOIN ( SELECT g.id_,g.name_,FORMAT(IFNULL(a.c,0),2)as score,a.source_id,a.source_name FROM (SELECT id_,NAME_,TYPE_ FROM act_id_group WHERE TYPE_ ='2' AND PID_ IS NULL ORDER BY TYPE_) g left join(SELECT d.qhzd_id,d.qhzd_name,IFNULL(sum(d.score),0)c,d.source_id,d.source_name FROM (select * from `t_issue_dcdb_kh` where khyf like '%${khyf}%' and source_id='反复投诉') d group by d.qhzd_id,d.source_id)a on g.id_=a.qhzd_id )t6 on h.qhzd_id=t6.id_

select h.id,h.qhzd_id,h.qhzd_name,t6.score from(select * from t_main_issue_kh where bm_type='5' and khyf=#{khyf}) h LEFT JOIN ( SELECT g.id_,g.name_,FORMAT(IFNULL(a.c,0),2)as score,a.source_id,a.source_name FROM (SELECT id_,NAME_,TYPE_ FROM act_id_group WHERE TYPE_ ='5' AND PID_ IS NULL ORDER BY TYPE_) g left join(SELECT d.qhzd_id,d.qhzd_name,IFNULL(sum(d.score),0)c,d.source_id,d.source_name FROM (select * from `t_issue_dcdb_kh` where khyf like '%${khyf}%'and source_id='反复投诉') d group by d.qhzd_id,d.source_id)a on g.id_=a.qhzd_id)t6 on h.qhzd_id=t6.id_

select h.id,h.qhzd_id,h.qhzd_name,t6.score from(select * from t_main_issue_kh where bm_type='2' and khyf=#{khyf}) h LEFT JOIN ( SELECT g.id_,g.name_,FORMAT(IFNULL(a.c,0),2)as score,a.source_id,a.source_name FROM (SELECT id_,NAME_,TYPE_ FROM act_id_group WHERE TYPE_ ='2' AND PID_ IS NULL ORDER BY TYPE_) g left join(SELECT d.qhzd_id,d.qhzd_name,IFNULL(sum(d.score),0)c,d.source_id,d.source_name FROM (select * from `t_issue_dcdb_kh` where khyf like '%${khyf}%'and source_id='督办问责') d group by d.qhzd_id,d.source_id)a on g.id_=a.qhzd_id)t6 on h.qhzd_id=t6.id_

select h.id,h.qhzd_id,h.qhzd_name,t6.score from(select * from t_main_issue_kh where bm_type='5' and khyf=#{khyf}) h LEFT JOIN ( SELECT g.id_,g.name_,FORMAT(IFNULL(a.c,0),2)as score,a.source_id,a.source_name FROM (SELECT id_,NAME_,TYPE_ FROM act_id_group WHERE TYPE_ ='5' AND PID_ IS NULL ORDER BY TYPE_) g left join(SELECT d.qhzd_id,d.qhzd_name,IFNULL(sum(d.score),0)c,d.source_id,d.source_name FROM (select * from `t_issue_dcdb_kh` where khyf like '%${khyf}%'and source_id='督办问责') d group by d.qhzd_id,d.source_id)a on g.id_=a.qhzd_id )t6 on h.qhzd_id=t6.id_

select h.id,h.qhzd_id,h.qhzd_name,t6.score from(select * from t_main_issue_kh where bm_type='2' and khyf=#{khyf}) h LEFT JOIN ( SELECT g.id_,g.name_,FORMAT(IFNULL(a.c,0),2)as score,a.source_id,a.source_name FROM (SELECT id_,NAME_,TYPE_ FROM act_id_group WHERE TYPE_ ='2' AND PID_ IS NULL ORDER BY TYPE_ ) g left join(SELECT d.qhzd_id,d.qhzd_name,IFNULL(sum(d.score),0)c,d.source_id,d.source_name FROM (select * from `t_issue_dcdb_kh` where khyf like '%${khyf}%'and source_id='监督检查') d group by d.qhzd_id,d.source_id)a on g.id_=a.qhzd_id)t6 on h.qhzd_id=t6.id_

select h.id,h.qhzd_id,h.qhzd_name,t6.score from(select * from t_main_issue_kh where bm_type='2' and khyf=#{khyf}) h LEFT JOIN ( SELECT g.id_,g.name_,FORMAT(IFNULL(a.c,0),2)as score,a.source_id,a.source_name FROM (SELECT id_,NAME_,TYPE_ FROM act_id_group WHERE TYPE_ ='2' AND PID_ IS NULL ORDER BY TYPE_) g left join(SELECT d.qhzd_id,d.qhzd_name,IFNULL(sum(d.score),0)c,d.source_id,d.source_name FROM (select * from `t_issue_dcdb_kh` where khyf like '%${khyf}%'and source_id='巡查机制') d group by d.qhzd_id,d.source_id)a on g.id_=a.qhzd_id)t6 on h.qhzd_id=t6.id_
